text: Ej mardum, az Parvardigoraton ʙitarsed va az ruze, ki hec padare cazoi farzandro ʙa uhda nagirad va hec farzande cazoi padarro uhdador nasavad, hazar kuned. Va'dai Alloh alʙatta, haq ast, pas zindagonii dunjo sumoro fireʙ nadihad, to ki oxiratro faromus nakuned va niz sajtoni fireʙkor ʙa karami Alloh fireʙaton nasozad
